Your loan is processing, will contact you within 1–2banking days, please be reachable!Your final loan amount might be adjusted based on your personal information. Reach us via official Facebook page if needed!

Hello！EGPCash needs to safely process your data so that you are qualified for loan. please authorize for every step to continue your loan application.

EGPCash should be authorized for contact person and text message. We will process information for build your network with your financial record. Without your permission, we won\t reach any of your contact.
Must input mobile number of relative
Company telephone number is wrong, please input the valid one
Please take a clear, colored photo.
EGPCash treat user information and privacy to great importance, we still strictly follow the privacy protection policy to make sure your information is safe
Make sure above mentioned ID images are provided, otherwise application will be rejected:
1.Make sure the ID document submitted is original document;
2.Make sure the image taken is complete and clear;
3.If image is not clear or not complete, will be rejected.
Please make sure your selfie is provided, otherwise the application will be rejected.
1.Put ID in front of you, don\t cover your face;
Make sure selfie provided is of yourself and is clear.
2.Make sure your face image is clear and complete.
Must provide above mentioned images, otherwise application will be rejected.
You only have two times for ID information verification,please take it seriously.
1. Please make sure it is done by yourself, and it will be compared with your picture on your ID, meanwhile, you only have two times for this verification
2. Please make sure during the recognition, your face is complete and clear with the capture area.
Click for live face identification, please move your face like the sample demostrated, this process will be compared with ID, so ensure your image is clear and movement is smooth.

You can settle the loan in any branches of the following DragonPay Payment Partners:
SM Department Store and Supermarket, SM Payment Counters and Savemore
Bills Payment > MORE BILLERS > Loans > DRAGON LOANS > Enter the following required details.
Go to cashier with slip for payment and keep your receipt.
Paying via Bayad Center, LBC, Cebuana Lhuillier, SM Payment Counters or Robinson’s Payment Center.
Get a payment form and write DRAGONPAY as Receiver/Biller Name.
Fill up the form provided from payment centers including reference No.(Lifetime ID) and Amount.
Go to cashier for payment and keep your receipt.
Settle your Account on or before 7pm of your DUE DATE, After repayment, Your repayment record will be upgraded within 1–2 working days.

EGPCash is an online product providing petty loans without mortgages. It focuses on helping young white-collar and blue-collar workers to meet their urgent needs in their daily life by providing a small loan of 1000 EGP to 20,000 EGP.EGPCash is an online processed app, which eliminates the tedious manual applications and processes of traditional financial services. It hopes to provide a new mode of borrowing which is more convenient, flexible, simpler and faster.
We want to continuously accomodateevery concerns , good commendation \nand inquiries, kindly emails us at : hr@gocashleg.com
If you want to join us, please send us your resume and we will contact you ASAP.\n recruitment email：hr@upeso.ph
Simple procedure for getting and repaying the loan
Repay through payment partners on the due date
Legal Full Name (As seen on your ID)
Legal Middle Name (Optional, if listed on ID)
Legal Last Name (As seen on your ID)

尊敬的客户： 您好！为了进一步提升您的业务体验和增强系统安全性，我司将在2019年2月26日（星期二）22:00-2月27日（星期三）9:00期间进行系统升级，届时系统将无法为您提供服务，系统升级结束后将恢复正常。 感谢您一直以来对我们的支持，如给您带来不便，敬请谅解，谢谢！
*Note: Please repay to the bank accounts above

The more payment methods you submit, the higher loan amount you will get,and the higher the loan approval rate
Do you have other payment methods?

1.Open your myFawry app .If you donot have this app, please download and finish register firstly. \n 2.Throw fawry pay tab on myFawry app. Enter the reference code,you can pay throw your myFawry wallet.
Access your device information permission to get mobile network information and help us prevent fraud.

EGPCash wants to access your phone book and contacts data to replace your input and speed up your app. The data will be encrypted and uploaded to our server. We will keep your data strictly confidential, and will only use it to help us prevent fraud and determine your eligibility for credit. We will only contact your chosen contact person to confirm your information when necessary.
Access devices used to take photos and record videos.
We use your location, device, and usage data for research purposes and to help us prevent fraud

Please allow EGPCash to store your phone number and installed app information on our servers to prevent fraud and verify the purpose of your identity. The security of your private information will be strictly protected and will not be disclosed to any third party

The information we collect will be uploaded to the server and used for loan review, please provide real information. By granting the permissions, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and ; Terms of Services
Repayment amount should be more than 100 EGP
*Note:Please complete your repayment before the expiry dateYou can pay at any FawryPay POS retail store
The amount entered cannot be empty
